summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 2033, for the improvement of Valley Street, from Howard Avenue to Boren Avenue, and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues, all in the City of Seattle by constructing concrete sidewalks thereon, by grading and curbing the same where necessary, and by constructing wooden cross walks providing for the necessary surface drainage,, under Ordinance No. 20438 and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against each parcel of land and part thereof shown in said roll, and providing for the collection thereof.
